Question_1.Context: The paper discusses the optimization of the production of [18F]AlF-P16-093 using a custom automated synthesis platform. The sensitivity of the radiochemical yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093 to reaction parameters was investigated.
Question_1.Question: What was the optimized none-decay-corrected yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093?
Question_1.Source: The optimized none-decay-corrected yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093 was 17.5 ± 2.2 GBq.

Question_2.Context: The paper mentions the use of a custom automated radiosynthesis platform called PiBOX for the production of [18F]AlF-P16-093. The system is described as low-cost and cassette-based.
Question_2.Question: What is the name of the custom automated radiosynthesis platform used for the production of [18F]AlF-P16-093?
Question_2.Source: The automated radiosynthesis system used for the production of [18F]AlF-P16-093 is called PiBOX.

Question_3.Context: The paper discusses the stability of the final product solution of [18F]AlF-P16-093. The stability was determined by sampling the product vial for up to 5 hours after the end of synthesis.
Question_3.Question: What was the rate of decline in radiochemical purity of [18F]AlF-P16-093 when stored at room temperature?
Question_3.Source: The rate of decline in radiochemical purity of ~ 1.4%/h was observed when [18F]AlF-P16-093 was stored at room temperature.

Question_4.Context: The paper mentions the use of Thin Layer Chromatography (TLC) for determining the stability of the final product solution of [18F]AlF-P16-093. Stability was evaluated for storage at room temperature and at 4°C.
Question_4.Question: How did the rate of decline in radiochemical purity of [18F]AlF-P16-093 differ between storage at room temperature and at 4°C?
Question_4.Source: The rate of decline in radiochemical purity was ~ 1.4%/h at room temperature and ~ 0.4%/h when stored at 4°C.

Question_5.Context: The paper discusses the large-scale production of [18F]AlF-P16-093 using the optimized PiBOX conditions. The results of the large-scale syntheses were compared with high activity production of similar compounds.
Question_5.Question: What was the molar activity of [18F]AlF-P16-093 produced in the large-scale runs?
Question_5.Source: The molar activity of [18F]AlF-P16-093 produced in the large-scale runs was 140 ± 11 GBq/µmole.

Question_6.Context: The paper discusses the efficiency of the QMA extraction during the optimization runs for [18F]AlF-P16-093 production. Two different types of QMA were used with different elution solutions.
Question_6.Question: Which type of QMA showed higher efficiency for [18F]F− extraction during the optimization runs?
Question_6.Source: QMA (Cl−) showed higher efficiency for [18F]F− extraction compared to QMA carb during the optimization runs.

Question_7.Context: The paper mentions the use of flow-controlled solid phase extraction (SPE) for purification of the reaction mixture during the production of [18F]AlF-P16-093. The efficiency of the SPE purification was evaluated.
Question_7.Question: What was the average efficiency of recovery of [18F]AlF-P16-093 using the HLB cartridge for purification?
Question_7.Source: The average efficiency of recovery of [18F]AlF-P16-093 using the HLB cartridge for purification was 97.5%.

Question_8.Context: The paper discusses the effect of starting P16-093 amount and the mole ratio of P16-093: AlCl3·6H2O on the yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093 during the optimization runs.
Question_8.Question: What was the impact of decreasing the mole ratio of P16-093: AlCl3·6H2O from 2:1 to 1:1 on the yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093?
Question_8.Source: There was a significant decrease in yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093 when the mole ratio of P16-093: AlCl3·6H2O was decreased from 2:1 to 1:1.

Question_9.Context: The paper discusses the time dependence of 18F-incorporation into P16-093 after [18F]AlF2+ formation. The effect of incubation time on 18F-incorporation was evaluated.
Question_9.Question: What was the impact of increasing the incubation time from 2 to 10 minutes on the percent of 18F-activity present as [18F]AlF-P16-093?
Question_9.Source: There was no difference in the percent of 18F-activity present as [18F]AlF-P16-093 when increasing the incubation time from 2 to 10 minutes.

Question_10.Context: The paper mentions the comparison of the large-scale production of [18F]AlF-P16-093 with high activity production of similar compounds. The results of the large-scale syntheses were evaluated.
Question_10.Question: How did the yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093 in the large-scale runs compare to the yield of similar compounds produced in high activity production?
Question_10.Source: The yield of [18F]AlF-P16-093 in the large-scale runs was approximately 2 times higher than the yield of similar compounds produced in high activity production.
